fields.description:
h5.Description

When building a module with 10.0.15063 the module build process will error out with the below

{code}
[WARN]  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\include\vccorlib.h(348): error C3940: 'EventRegistrationToken': identifier not found - possible mismatch between compiler and library versions. Please ensure vccorlib.h/.lib, vccorlib120.dll and c1xx.dll match [C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj]
[WARN]  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\include\vccorlib.h(348): fatal error C1903: unable to recover from previous error(s); stopping compilation [C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj]
[TRACE] Done Building Project "C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj" (default targets) -- FAILED.
[TRACE] Done Building Project "C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj.metaproj" (default targets) -- FAILED.
[TRACE] Done Building Project "C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj.metaproj" (default targets) -- FAILED.
Done Building Project "C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.sln" (default targets) -- FAILED.
[DEBUG] Build FAILED.
[WARN]  "C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.sln" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj.metaproj" (default target) (2) ->
"C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj.metaproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj" (default target) (5) ->
(ClCompile target) ->
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\include\vccorlib.h(348): error C3940: 'EventRegistrationToken': identifier not found - possible mismatch between compiler and library versions. Please ensure vccorlib.h/.lib, vccorlib120.dll and c1xx.dll match [C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj]
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\include\vccorlib.h(348): fatal error C1903: unable to recover from previous error(s); stopping compilation [C:\Users\ewan\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\myawesomemod\windows\Windows10.ARM\ComFoo.vcxproj]

    0 Warning(s)
    2 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:00:00.66
{code}

Unlike TIMOB-24908 this issue is not resolved by setting a targetsdkversion

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Install SDK 10.0.15063 https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/windows-10-sdk
# Run {{appc new -t timodule --id com.foo -n myawesomemodule}}
# {{cd myawesomemodule/windows}}
# {{appc run -p windows --build-only}}

h5.Actual

Error above is thrown

h5.Expected

Should be able to build module
fields.summary: Windows: Unable to build a module when using SDK 10.0.15063.0 and VS 2015

comments.body: This one is fixed for now, along with TIMOB-25166. If I remember correctly original issue was fixed [since I updated nuget.exe|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/commit/43d6b4a0332b59bbc36efb5f23567d8b4591dc6f].
[~kiguchi] [~eharris] Merged for master. Does it need a backport for 6_2_X?
